meanings.definition: A small, slender insect with fringed wings.
meanings.sent1: The thrips landed softly on the leaf.
meanings.sent2: I saw a thrips flying near the flowers.
meanings.sent3: Why did the thrips bring a tiny umbrella to the garden?
meanings.sent4: The thrips danced in the air like delicate fairies.
meanings.sent5: The thrips' delicate wings shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Any of various small, slender insects of the order Thysanoptera, typically feeding on plant sap.
meanings.sent1: The thrips gathered on the plant to feed.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use traps to catch thrips in the fields.
meanings.sent3: The thrips threw a tiny party on the tomato plant.
meanings.sent4: The thrips sucked the life out of the green leaves.
meanings.sent5: The thrips multiplied quickly, causing damage to the crops.
